summary: JASMIN scheduled quarterly maintenance day: Tues 21 Jan 2025

summary: CEDA Archive FTP server down for maintenance

updates.details: The CEDA Archive FTP server is currently down for maintenance. Please check back for further updates.
REMINDER: as per announcement, these hosts will be retired on Friday 13 December at 16:00.
